title: Fragments, ca. 1800
medium:
Medium: cotton 
Technique: printed by engraved copper plate on plain weave
dimensions:
A. Warp: 49cm (19 1/2in.). Weft: 83cm (32 3/4in.)
B: Warp: 68cm (26 3/4in.). Weft: 84.5cm (33 1/4in.)
C: Warp: 49.5cm (19 1/2in.). Weft: 50cm (19 3/4in.)
description:
Copy of the Petitpierre design, 'le char de l'aurore'.
Three pieces which when overlapped do not make the full repeat.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments, ca. 1800.Medium: cotton 
Technique: printed by engraved copper plate on plain weave. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-96-a/c.
